attributes.background:
Having recently sold my car for scrap, and filled my part of the V5C form submitting to the DVLA, i have since been stung for a £8o fine.
There is a definite whole in the process leaving the seller responsible for the car despite having sold and completed their documnetation.
The current V5C states that if you don't receive confirmation from the DVLA within 4 weeks of selling your car to contact the DVLA.
However the form should be able to faciltate a complete transaction i.e. relinquishing any ownership rights from the seller.
In my instance, the failing of the purchaser to return their part of the form resoltued in me receiving penalty.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
